attributes.action: Automate and drastically increase the prison sentences for possession of guns and knives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely if there was an automatic 10, 15 or 20 year sentence for the possession of lethal weapons, this would deter many criminals, especially younger people, from carrying them. We must do something about this issue, so that decent law-abiding citizens can feel safe to walk our streets again!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
